text: Understand how memory management works, even though you don’t have to do it yourself
translation: 了解内存管理的工作原理，即使您不必自己做

caption: Photo by Markus Spiske on Unsplash

text: In languages like C or C++, the programmer is responsible for the dynamic allocation and deallocation of memory on the heap. But in Python, programmers don’t have to preallocate or deallocate memory.
translation: 在像C或C ++这样的语言中，程序员负责堆上内存的动态分配和释放。 但是在Python中，程序员不必预先分配或取消分配内存。

text: (本文翻译自Prashant Sharma的文章《Understand Garbage Collection in Python》，参考：https://medium.com/better-programming/understand-garbage-collection-in-python-5bb118d1748e)
translation: （本文翻译自Prashant Sharma的文章，《了解Python中的垃圾收集》，参考：https：//medium.com/better-programming/understand-garbage-collection-in-python-5bb118d1748e）
